course_title: Advanced Neonatal and Infant Health Assessment
class_notes: This section is for NNP students only. On-campus intensive dates: Sept 13-15 and Nov 7-10.
course_description: With a foundation in developmental genetics, the student will develop advanced competencies in assessment and interpretation of pertinent history, and in the physical assessment of the neonate/infant to age 2. An emphasis on clinical decision-making, interpretation of findings and hands-on practice is included.
sections: Class Nbr: 6473, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: M. Conway-Orgel, Status: Open
